name: TechnoSIP Inc
description:
TechnoSIP team has more than a decade of expertise providing technology solutions in area of Mobile Apps (iOS, Android, PhoneGap), large scale trading application, enterprise applications, ecommerce portals for range of complex domains and cutting edge technologies like Machine Learning, Big Data, Natural Language Processing etc for multitude of client ranging from startups to SMB to fortune top wall street firms.
Startup & SMB had leverage on TechnoSIP's deep technology insight to propel their growth to next level. At TechnoSIP we believe client success is TechnoSIP success. With more than a decade of industry insight TechnoSIP team had help client identify technology SIP(Strategic Infliction Points) for life cycle of client business and help them rediscover new growth areas. 
Expertise – 
Mobile App Development (iOS, Android, PhoneGap) 
Machine Learning Applications, Natural Language Processing 
Big Data Analytics 
Technology roadmap and Strategy. 
Semantic Search 
Predictive Analytics 
Deep learning 
Mobile Deep Links 
Ecommerce websites/ portals 
Enterprise Applications 
Voice driven application.
